name: bug
description: Something is not working.

name: feat
description: New feature or request.

name: improvement
description: Minor improvement.

name: effort/mini
description: It will probably need less than an hour to solve this problem.

name: effort/small
description: It will probably need less than a day to solve this problem.

name: effort/medium
description: It will probably need about a week or two to solve this problem.

name: effort/huge
description: It will probably need a month or more to solve this problem.

name: stale
description: Feedback from one or more authors is required to proceed.

name: blocking
description: Blocks milestones or other issues or pulls.

name: breaking change
description: Changes behavior in a breaking manner.

name: good first issue
description: A good issue to tackle when being a novice to the project.

name: rfc
description: A request for comments to discuss and share ideas.

name: invalid
description: The request is invalid or spam.

name: help wanted
description: We are looking for help on this one.

name: tests
description: Affects tests.

name: upstream
description: Issue is caused by an upstream dependency.

name: pending reply
description: Awaiting reply of author or contributor. Issue will be closed on inactivity.

name: no-close
description: Do not close this.

name: area/identity
description: This issue affects Ory's identity services.

name: area/permission
description: This issue affects Ory's permission services.

name: area/oauth2
description: This issue affects Ory's OAuth2 and OpenID Connect services.

name: area/compliance
description: This issue affects Ory's compliance services.

name: area/zero-trust
description: This issue affects Ory's Zero Trust services.

name: area/sdk
description: This issue affects Ory's SDKs.

name: area/cli
description: This issue affects Ory's CLI.

name: area/tooling
description: This issue affects Ory's tooling.

name: area/docs
description: This issue affects Ory's documentation.

name: area/ci
description: This issue affects Ory's CI.
